cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.NE, cs.CL, cs.CV. 

The paper deals with the training of recurrent neural networks, which is a topic that falls under the machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI) sub-categories. The use of hierarchical recurrent neural networks (HRNNs) is also mentioned, which is a technique that has been applied in natural language processing (cs.CL) and computer vision (cs.CV) tasks. Additionally, the paper discusses the use of truncated backpropagation through time (TBPTT), which is a common optimization algorithm used in neural networks, and is relevant to the neural networks (cs.NE) sub-category.
